data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brix, Saskia, Bruce, Niel L. (2008): Prochelator tupuhi sp. nov., the first record of Desmosomatidae Sars, 1897 (Crustacea: Isopoda) from New Zealand waters *. Zootaxa 1866: 482-492, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183873
